Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_SEC_GROUPS_INS_ID_SP" ( P_GROUP_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_GROUP_DESCRIPTION IN VARCHAR2, P_GROUP_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_GROUP_ROLE_TYPE IN VARCHAR2, P_GROUP_TYPE_ID IN NUMBER, P_PRINCIPAL_TYPE IN VARCHAR2, P_PRINCIPAL_ID IN NUMBER, P_IS_ACTIVE IN NUMBER, P_CREATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1, P_ID OUT NUMBER ) IS BEGIN SELECT CMN_SEC_GROUPS_S1.NEXTVAL INTO P_ID FROM DUAL; INSERT INTO CMN_SEC_GROUPS ( ID, GROUP_CODE, GROUP_ROLE_TYPE, GROUP_TYPE_ID, PRINCIPAL_TYPE, PRINCIPAL_ID, IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( P_ID, P_GROUP_CODE, P_GROUP_ROLE_TYPE, P_GROUP_TYPE_ID, P_PRINCIPAL_TYPE, P_PRINCIPAL_ID, P_IS_ACTIVE, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY ); CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS_INS_SP ( 'CMN_SEC_GROUPS', P_ID, P_GROUP_NAME, P_GROUP_DESCRIPTION, P_CREATED_BY, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL ); END;
